title: This Is Business
description:
Swagu and Perk discuss how it's time for Damian Lillard to make a tough decision, how Kareem Abdul-Jabbar should be praising LeBron James instead of criticizing him, why Oklahoma fans better have the same energy for Lincoln Riley that they had for Kevin Durant, and why neither of them are ever going to go to outer space like Michael Strahan. Let's get it.
